user_created: user is successfully created in our system
email_already_in_use: email is already registered in our system
email_not_valid: please enter a valid email address
a_technical_problem_occurred: a technical problem occurred. please try again later.
pending: pending. please check your email address and take action accordingly.
signup_email_html_message: {{h2}}thanks!{{h2End}} {{h3}}In order to finish your registration, please click {{br}} {{a}} {{h3End}}
signup_email_text_message: thanks. please copy and paste the following link into your browser in order to finish your registration {{resetURL}}
password_length: password can not be less than 8 characters or longer than 70 characters
password_and_confirm_equality: password and password confirmation must be equal
technical_problem_when_logging: a technical problem occurred and we could not log you in
changedName_and_changedNameConfirm_must_: changedName and changedNameConfirm must be equal
forgot_password_html_message: {{h3}}did you forgot your password? please click the following link {{br}}{{a}}{{h3End}}{{h3}}{{br}} this link will expire in 10 minutes.{{br}} if you received this email accidentally or remembered your password {{br}} please disregard this email message.{{h3End}}
forgot_password_text_message: did you forget your password? please copy and paste the following link into your browser {{resetURL}} this link will expire in 10 minutes. if you received this email accidentally or remembered your password please disregard this email message
please_provide_all_the_information1: please provide all the information. please provide the following: 'email', 'password', 'passwordConfirm', 'userName'

please_provide_all_the_information3: please provide all the information. please provide the following: 'changedName', 'changedNameConfirm'
userName_length: userName can not be less than 3 characters or more than 30 characters
